law.text: If any place of the kind mentioned in KRS 217.280 or any thing mentioned in KRS 217.290 to 217.320 is constructed, kept, maintained or permitted to remain in a condition contrary to any of the provisions of KRS 217.280 to 217.320, the same is declared a nuisance. No person shall unlawfully maintain or allow or permit to exist a nuisance as defined in this section.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2060b-6.
